description.value: The potency of Spellmasters past flows through you. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Identify Magic], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trick Magic Item], you can spend a Mythic Point to make the check at mythic proficiency. The first time each day that you critically succeed on a check with a skill corresponding to any magical traditions you possess while Identifying Magic, Recalling Knowledge, or Tricking a Magic Item, you regain a Mythic Point.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-09: The Power of Legends
